title: Amazon Plans Furniture Assembly Service to Catch Wayfair
itunes:title: Amazon Plans Furniture Assembly Service to Catch Wayfair
description:
Dr. Ian Lustbader, Clinical Professor of Medicine at NYU Langone, discusses seeing a decease in people getting vaccinated after J&J's shot was linked to blood clots. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Venture Capital Reporter Sarah McBride explain how Elon Musk’s Boring Company Found paradise in a town with ‘plenty of dirt.’ Bloomberg News Technology and E-Commerce Reporter Spencer Soper talks about Amazon experimenting with a premium service that lets customers opt to have furniture or appliances assembled as soon they arrive at their homes. And we Drive to the Close with Hilary Kramer, President and CIO at A&G Capital.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
